Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Slow moving, oval shaped, red and gold glow
divs: sighting detailswhile driving home highway 212, east of enid, ok at appox. 2pm i spotted the craft hovering slowly from north to south across the highway. it was a couple miles ahead of me but i could clearly make out an oval shaped craft glowing brightly with red\golden light. i tracked the object across the sky, it kept a steady speed a few hundred feet above the ground, while it moved it emitted a pulsing light that seemed to be scanning the surrounding land. it turned in a more easterly direction and disappeared over the horizon. i sped up to try and see the object again however it was no where to be seen. there were other drivers who could have seen this object.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Enid
There were no other sightings in Enid on or around November 23rd 2011
